#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
int i,num=0,k;
char str[10];
for(i=1;i<=4;i++)
{
	scanf("%s",str);
	if(strcmp(str,"black")==0)k=0;
	else if(strcmp(str,"brown")==0)k=1;
	else if(strcmp(str,"red")==0)k=2;
	else if(strcmp(str,"orange")==0)k=3;
	else if(strcmp(str,"yellow")==0)k=4;
	else if(strcmp(str,"green")==0)k=5;
	else if(strcmp(str,"blue")==0)k=6;
	else if(strcmp(str,"violet")==0)k=7;
	else if(strcmp(str,"grey")==0)k=8;
	else if(strcmp(str,"white")==0)k=9;
	num=num+k*pow(16,4-i);
}
	printf("%d",num);
	for(i=1;i<=k;i++)
	printf("0");
	printf(" Guntur\n");
	return(0);
}
